messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] a thank you
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi Brenda, That was me!  I am so glad that you are enjoying the chess book.  My son has taken back the stack of chess books back to the library for now, so
messages.messageBody:
> Date: Fri, 12 Jul 2002 22:37:03 +0200
> From: Alan & Brenda Leonard <abtleo@...>
>Subject: Re: a thank you...

>Back when I was asking about chess books, some wonderful person from here
>recommneded the Usborne Guide to Advanced Chess. (I had a computer
>clean-up
>fit recently and deleted her email, unfortunately.) But my books arrived
>yesterday, and everybody here has scanned that one at least once. It's
>terrific, and just what we needed.
>
>Thanks so much, and I'm sorry I forgot who you were!
>
>brenda

Hi Brenda,
That was me! I am so glad that you are enjoying the chess book. My son has
taken back the stack of chess books back to the library for now, so he
doesn't have any more recommendations at the moment. We've been really busy
with summer stuff, and he'll get back into chess in the fall probably (or
not!)
~Lesley
